description: People on the Isle of Man with Type 1 diabetes will receive painless glucose monitors on prescription.
title: Diabetics on Isle of Man to receive blood sugar monitors on prescription
title_page: Diabetics on Isle of Man to receive blood sugar monitors on prescription - BBC News
maintext: Natasha Parry, of Diabetes Isle of Man, which has campaigned for the devices to be made available on the Manx NHS, said it was "really welcome news".
